monster.framing: Full body, centered in frame, facing left (toward player). Dynamic pose showing the creature's nature. No background elements.
monster.technical_params: Game sprite on transparent background. Single character only. Clear silhouette readable at small sizes.

character.framing: Upper body portrait, 3/4 view facing right. Heroic pose. Character fills 70-80% of the frame.
character.technical_params: Game character portrait on transparent background. Single character only. Expressive face clearly visible.
character.prompt_template: A {description}. Fantasy RPG hero character portrait.

item.framing: Centered item icon, slightly angled for depth. Object fills 80% of frame. No hand holding it.
item.technical_params: Game item icon on transparent background. Single object only. Clean readable silhouette. Suitable for inventory grid display.

ui.framing: Flat UI element design. Clean edges suitable for 9-slice or tiling.
ui.technical_params: Game UI element. Clean edges. Consistent with dark fantasy RPG theme using bronze/gold/amber tones. Must tile or 9-slice cleanly if applicable.
ui.prompt_template: A {description}. Dark fantasy RPG UI element with bronze and gold tones.

background.framing: Wide establishing shot. Atmospheric scene with depth. No characters or UI elements.
background.technical_params: Game background scene at 4:3 aspect ratio. Atmospheric, painterly. Suitable as a game screen background. No text or UI elements.
background.prompt_template: A {description}. Fantasy RPG environment background scene.

splash.framing: Dramatic composition suitable for a title screen or loading screen. Cinematic framing.
splash.technical_params: Game splash art at 4:3 aspect ratio. Dramatic, high-impact composition. Rich detail.
splash.prompt_template: A {description}. Epic fantasy RPG splash art, dramatic and cinematic.
examples: dark castle silhouette against stormy sky
